org.lenskit.data.ratings

Class RatingSummary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.ratings.RatingSummary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Shareable
@DefaultProvider(value=RatingSummaryBuilder.class)
public class RatingSummary
extends Object
implements Serializable

    A summary of the ratings data.

    Since:
    3.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static RatingSummary create(EventDAO dao)

        Create a rating summary from an event DAO. This uses FastRatingSummaryBuilder and is therefore efficient but does not handle unrate events.

        Parameters:
        dao - The events.
        Returns:
        The rating summary.

      • getGlobalMean

        public double getGlobalMean()

      • getItems

        public LongSet getItems()

      • getItemMean

        public double getItemMean(long item)

        Get the mean rating for an item.

        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        Returns:
        The item’s mean rating, or Double.NaN if the item is absent.

      • getItemOffset

        public double getItemOffset(long item)

        Get the item’s average offset from global mean.

        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        Returns:
        The item’s average offset from the global mean rating, or 0 if the item is missing

      • getItemRatingCount

        public int getItemRatingCount(long item)

        Get the number of ratings for the item.
